The Heritrix Development team will be putting out a preview release soon 
for Heritrix 2.x and we'd like to enlist a broad number of testers to 
experiment with the code.

If you are interested in performing formal testing in exchange for kudos 
from the community and some form of monetary compensation (cash, gift 
card, etc), please contact me off list.

Thanks!

Kris

Kris Carpenter Negulescu
Director, Web Group
